title: MC/Launcher Update
content: New Info Account Section in Settings, Updated Buttons on Servers Page, Added New Font Doto to all pages sections, Added New Mendora Core Mod, Updated Partners Sections, Fixed Bug where launching mc says you must login with ur microsoft account

title: Launcher Update
content: Bug fix where cracked login is logging in with the name Player instead of the input username, Few UI Changes, Added new option in settings (width,height)
